item.title: 2024] price in Raichur, RTO, insurance and EMI
item.description:
<![CDATA[Iconic Scooter Reimagined
Buying the Bajaj Chetak from the Bangalore Bajaj shop was a sensible and sentimental decision for my everyday commute. This 1.42 lakh electric scooter blends contemporary technology and traditional design. I'm transported back in time to the original Chetak days by the sleek, beautiful lines and graceful curves of its classic design. For my everyday travels, the electric motor's range of around 90 km on a single charge is more than enough. Smooth and silent acceleratio...]]>
